backend/main.mo: Defines audit logging types, access control state, role models, and controller initialization with various role checks and stored state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and role-handling behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes with global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, role checks, dashboard view selection, and conditional rendering of admin or ICP ops dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders login or access-denied guidance with principal copy support and embedded ICP connection and control panels for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AuditLogDetailDi: Displays detailed audit log entry information with formatted timestamps, action descriptions, and severity indicators in a dialog.
Shows the user's authentication status, principal ID, and backend connectivity with copy and refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/BroadcastConfigP: Provides UI to view and update external security event broadcasting settings, including enabling/disabling and endpoint URL.
Offers an in‑app code editor for backend and frontend files with file switching, change tracking, and apply/reset functionality.
frontend/src/components/DashboardViewSwi: Renders buttons for switching between allowed dashboard views like security and ICP operations.
Explains deployment steps and links to deploy the app via the Caffeine platform with guidance alerts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main app header with authentication controls, role-based titles, theme switching, and optional dashboard view switching.
frontend/src/components/IcpConnectionPan: Displays ICP network health, canister info, and connection status with retry and error alerts.
frontend/src/components/IcpControllerMan: Provides UI to list, grant, and revoke ICP controller roles with principal input and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsCatal: Shows a searchable, categorized list of ICP configuration controls with import/export and reset functionality.
Renders an individual control row using the appropriate input type and passes value changes upward.
frontend/src/components/IcpControlsPanel: Wraps and displays the ICP controls catalog with a header and link to the full configuration section.
frontend/src/components/IcpMainnetDeploy: UI card explaining prerequisites and step‑by‑step instructions for deploying canisters to the ICP mainnet.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter a name and submit it via a profile‑saving mutation.
frontend/src/components/RealTimeAlertPan: Displays recent security alerts and flagged users in real time by filtering logs from the last five minutes.
frontend/src/components/RolesAccessPanel: Shows caller and app‑controller principals, handles initialization, and provides copy and role‑related actions.
frontend/src/components/RootTerminalPane: Interactive terminal UI that executes registered commands, tracks history, and records audit entries.
frontend/src/components/SecuritySummaryP: Summarizes recent security events such as critical alerts, failed logins, and unauthorized actions over 24 hours and 7 days.
frontend/src/components/SuperuserAuditPa: Provides UI for superusers to export audit logs and flagged user data, recording audit entries for each export action.
frontend/src/components/TestActionsPanel: UI for creating and submitting test audit log entries with configurable fields and event types.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Manages user flagging, unflagging, and removal, displaying flagged users and allowing principal-based operations.
frontend/src/components/WorldWideWebCont: Manages granting and revoking World Wide Web Controller roles, validating principals and listing current controllers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs a lightweight backend connectivity check using the actor and exposes connection status and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardView.ts: Tracks and persists the selected dashboard view based on permissions, allowing switching when permitted.
frontend/src/hooks/useIcpControls.ts: React hook managing ICP control state via URL, session storage, and defaults, with setters for network, canister, and other registered controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and login/logout handling using AuthClient, restoring identities on load.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, controller statuses, and related backend data.
frontend/src/icp-controls/bindings.ts: Utility functions for parsing, serializing, validating, and identifying ICP control values and session keys.
frontend/src/icp-controls/registry.ts: Registry defining all ICP control categories and control metadata including types, defaults, and options.
frontend/src/icp-controls/types.ts: Type definitions for ICP control categories, control structures, and options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the root React app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin security dashboard with panels for connection, auth, roles, controls, alerts, logs, terminal, and deployment tools. Fetches audit logs and passes them to several panels.
frontend/src/pages/IcpOpsDashboard.tsx: Displays the ICP operations dashboard, selecting terminal configuration based on user roles. Includes connection, auth, roles, controls, and an operations terminal.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Provides React Query key helpers for controller statuses, lists, and related role-scoped data.
frontend/src/terminal/commandRegistry.ts: Exports the main terminal command registry composed of core commands.
frontend/src/terminal/coreCommands.ts: Defines core terminal commands including help, clear, and security role management with audit logging and query invalidation.
frontend/src/terminal/icpControllerComma: Defines a restricted command set for ICP Controller users, including help, clear, and profile management commands with audit logging.
frontend/src/terminal/terminalGuards.ts: Implements helpers for audit recording, error classification, backend/auth checks, and parsing utilities for terminal commands.
frontend/src/terminal/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for terminal commands, execution context, outputs, and history entries.
frontend/src/terminal/worldWideWebContro: Defines allowed commands for World Wide Web Controller users, including help, clear, and a role status check with audit logging.
frontend/src/utils/codeEditorStorage.ts: Manages code editor state in localStorage, including loading, saving, applying changes, and detecting unsaved edits.
frontend/src/utils/icpControls.ts: Provides ICP network and canister ID utilities, including defaults, validation, and network labels/hosts.
frontend/src/utils/icpControlsImportExpo: Handles export, download, import, and file-reading of ICP Controls configuration with validation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project state, planned features, issues, and architectural decisions.
